Package de.db.derpate.servlet

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseServlet
    This abstract HttpServlet should be used for all created servlets, as it sets the character encoding and stops request, if request or response is null.
    Supported Methods: GET, POST, DELETE
    ChangePasswordServlet
    This HttpServlet can be used by Godfathers and Admins to change their own password.
    Allowed methods: POST
    FilterServlet
    This abstract class extends the BaseServlet and expects ServletFilters (constructor), that check, if the request is valid (for example, if the user is logged in).
    Use BaseServlet instead, if a servlet should be publicly available without any restriction.
    GodfatherFilterServlet
    This servlet is only available for Trainees and is used to filter available godfathers or - if the trainee already selected a godfahter - get information of their selected godfather.
    GodfatherImageServlet
    This HttpServlet is available for Trainees only and is used to get the image of a Godfather (set by Godfather).
    If no image is found (because the Godfather hasn't set one), error 404 is returned.
    LoginServlet
    This HttpServlet get's called by the client, when the user tries to log on.
    LogoutServlet
    This HttpServlet is used to remove the relation between the client's HttpSession and the logged in LoginUser.
    Allowed http methods: GET
    RedirectServlet
    This HttpServlet redirects the client to the default welcome page
    Allowed methods: GET
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ServletParameter
    This enum should unify the parameter names.
